Parameters

show(sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, target_sim_info: sims.sim_info.SimInfo, on_ok_selected: Callable[[ui.ui_dialog.UiDialogOkCancel], Any] = <function CommonFunctionUtils.noop>, on_cancel_selected: Callable[[ui.ui_dialog.UiDialogOkCancel], Any] = <function CommonFunctionUtils.noop>)Â¶

Show the dialog and invoke the callbacks upon the player making a choice.

Parameters

  • sim_info â The Sim that is the source of the question.

  • target_sim_info â The Sim that is the target of the question.

  • on_ok_selected â Invoked upon the player clicking the Ok button in the dialog.

  • on_cancel_selected â Invoked upon the player clicking the Cancel button in the dialog.
